headline: CenterPoint Energy, Inc. Announces Offering of $900 Million of Convertible Senior Notes Due 2028
summary: HOUSTON, July 28, 2025--CenterPoint Energy, Inc. (NYSE: CNP) or "CenterPoint" today announced that it intends to offer, subject to market and other conditions, $900 million aggregate principal amount of its Convertible Senior Notes due 2028 (the "convertible notes") in a private placement to persons reasonably believed to be qualified institutional buyers pursuant to Rule 144A under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the "Securities Act").
